about.summary: A 'modeltime' extension that implements time series ensemble forecasting methods including model averaging, weighted averaging, and stacking. These techniques are popular methods to improve forecast accuracy and stability. Refer to papers such as "Machine-Learning Models for Sales Time Series Forecasting" Pavlyshenko, B.M. (2019) <doi:10.3390>.

A 'modeltime' extension that implements time series ensemble forecasting methods including model averaging, weighted averaging, and stacking. These techniques are popular methods to improve forecast accuracy and stability. Refer to papers such as "Machine-Learning Models for Sales Time Series Forecasting" Pavlyshenko, B.M. (2019) <doi:10.3390>.

name: r-modeltime.ensemble
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '1.0.3' %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}
{% set native = 'm2w64-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-modeltime.ensemble
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/modeltime.ensemble_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/modeltime.ensemble/modeltime.ensemble_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 5188b13ba9a2cf6fed4d0087ac92b67a3ba5b40141317cf97f809478baf8b69e

build:
  merge_build_host: True  # [win]
  number: 0
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-cli
    - r-doparallel
    - r-dplyr >=1.0.0
    - r-foreach
    - r-generics
    - r-glue
    - r-magrittr
    - r-modeltime >=1.2.3
    - r-modeltime.resample >=0.2.1
    - r-parsnip >=0.1.6
    - r-purrr
    - r-recipes >=0.1.15
    - r-rlang >=0.1.2
    - r-rsample
    - r-stringr
    - r-tibble
    - r-tictoc
    - r-tidyr
    - r-timetk >=2.5.0
    - r-tune >=0.1.2
    - r-workflows >=0.2.1
    - r-yardstick
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-cli
    - r-doparallel
    - r-dplyr >=1.0.0
    - r-foreach
    - r-generics
    - r-glue
    - r-magrittr
    - r-modeltime >=1.2.3
    - r-modeltime.resample >=0.2.1
    - r-parsnip >=0.1.6
    - r-purrr
    - r-recipes >=0.1.15
    - r-rlang >=0.1.2
    - r-rsample
    - r-stringr
    - r-tibble
    - r-tictoc
    - r-tidyr
    - r-timetk >=2.5.0
    - r-tune >=0.1.2
    - r-workflows >=0.2.1
    - r-yardstick

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('modeltime.ensemble')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('modeltime.ensemble')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://github.com/business-science/modeltime.ensemble
  license: MIT
  summary: A 'modeltime' extension that implements time series ensemble forecasting methods including
    model averaging, weighted averaging, and stacking. These techniques are popular
    methods to improve forecast accuracy and stability. Refer to papers such as "Machine-Learning
    Models for Sales Time Series Forecasting" Pavlyshenko, B.M. (2019) <doi:10.3390>.
  license_family: MIT
  license_file:
    - '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/MIT'
    - LICENSE

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r

# Package: modeltime.ensemble
# Type: Package
# Title: Ensemble Algorithms for Time Series Forecasting with Modeltime
# Version: 1.0.3
# Authors@R: c( person("Matt", "Dancho", email = "mdancho@business-science.io", role = c("aut", "cre")), person("Business Science", role = "cph") )
# Description: A 'modeltime' extension that implements time series ensemble forecasting methods including model averaging, weighted averaging, and stacking. These techniques are popular methods to improve forecast accuracy and stability. Refer to papers such as "Machine-Learning Models for Sales Time Series Forecasting" Pavlyshenko, B.M. (2019) <doi:10.3390>.
# URL: https://github.com/business-science/modeltime.ensemble
# BugReports: https://github.com/business-science/modeltime.ensemble/issues
# License: MIT + file LICENSE
# Encoding: UTF-8
# Depends: modeltime (>= 1.2.3), modeltime.resample (>= 0.2.1), R (>= 3.5)
# Imports: tune (>= 0.1.2), rsample, yardstick, workflows (>= 0.2.1), parsnip (>= 0.1.6), recipes (>= 0.1.15), timetk (>= 2.5.0), tibble, dplyr (>= 1.0.0), tidyr, purrr, glue, stringr, rlang (>= 0.1.2), cli, generics, magrittr, tictoc, parallel, doParallel, foreach,
# Suggests: gt, crayon, dials, glmnet, progressr, utils, roxygen2, earth, testthat, tidymodels, xgboost, tidyverse, lubridate, knitr, rmarkdown, covr, qpdf, remotes
# RoxygenNote: 7.2.3
# VignetteBuilder: knitr
# NeedsCompilation: no
# Packaged: 2023-04-17 18:00:39 UTC; mdanc
# Author: Matt Dancho [aut, cre], Business Science [cph]
